` *---------------------------------------------------------------------* * Report YGPL_DBA_TABLES_SIZE *---------------------------------------------------------------------*
REPORT ygpl_dba_tables_size LINE-SIZE 256.
TABLES: tadir, tdevc. TYPE-POOLS: abap, icon.
SELECT-OPTIONS: s_srcs FOR tadir-srcsystem DEFAULT sy-sysid, s_soft FOR tdevc-dlvunit, s_name FOR tadir-obj_name, s_pack FOR tadir-devclass. PARAMETERS: p_ext TYPE abap_bool AS CHECKBOX DEFAULT abap_true. SELECT-OPTIONS: s_author FOR tadir-author DEFAULT sy-uname.
PARAMETERS: p_size TYPE ygpl_dba_table_size.
TYPES tt_results TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ygpl_dba_tables_size_result WITH DEFAULT KEY. DATA o_obj_size TYPE ygpl_dba_interfaces=>ti_object_size.
INITIALIZATION. PERFORM set_default_object_size IN PROGRAM ygpl_dba_cockpit CHANGING p_size o_obj_size.
START-OF-SELECTION. DATA o_list TYPE ygpl_dba_interfaces=>ti_table_list.
PERFORM create_list IN PROGRAM ygpl_dba_cockpit USING s_srcs[] s_soft[] s_name[] s_pack[] s_author[] p_ext p_size CHANGING o_list.
DATA d_table_name TYPE ygplidba_tables_size=>td_table_name. DATA d_table_size TYPE ygplidba_tables_size=>td_size. FIELD-SYMBOLS: <i> LIKE LINE OF o_list->components. DATA t_results TYPE tt_results. DATA s_result LIKE LINE OF t_results.
* Convert list LOOP AT o_list->components ASSIGNING <i>. CLEAR s_result. s_result-name = d_table_name = <i>-name. d_table_size = o_obj_size->get_table_size( d_table_name ). s_result-percent = 100 * " Percent 100 * " 2 decimals d_table_size / o_obj_size->db_size. s_result-size = d_table_size * 1000 / 1024. " 3 decimals s_result-tadir_info = o_obj_size->get_table_information( table_name = d_table_name ). APPEND s_result TO t_results. ENDLOOP.
PERFORM display_result USING t_results.
END-OF-SELECTION. *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& Form DISPLAY_RESULT *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* FORM display_result USING t_results TYPE tt_results. DATA no_need_just_for_use_case_link TYPE ygpl_dba_tables_size_result. SORT t_results BY size DESCENDING.
CALL FUNCTION 'REUSE_ALV_GRID_DISPLAY' EXPORTING * I_INTERFACE_CHECK = ' ' * I_BYPASSING_BUFFER = ' ' * I_BUFFER_ACTIVE = ' ' * I_CALLBACK_PROGRAM = ' ' * I_CALLBACK_PF_STATUS_SET = ' ' * I_CALLBACK_USER_COMMAND = ' ' * I_CALLBACK_TOP_OF_PAGE = ' ' * I_CALLBACK_HTML_TOP_OF_PAGE = ' ' * I_CALLBACK_HTML_END_OF_LIST = ' ' i_structure_name = 'YGPL_DBA_TABLES_SIZE_RESULT' * I_BACKGROUND_ID = ' ' * I_GRID_TITLE = * I_GRID_SETTINGS = * IS_LAYOUT = * IT_FIELDCAT = * IT_EXCLUDING = * IT_SPECIAL_GROUPS = * IT_SORT = * IT_FILTER = * IS_SEL_HIDE = * I_DEFAULT = 'X' * I_SAVE = ' ' * IS_VARIANT = * IT_EVENTS = * IT_EVENT_EXIT = * IS_PRINT = * IS_REPREP_ID = * I_SCREEN_START_COLUMN = 0 * I_SCREEN_START_LINE = 0 * I_SCREEN_END_COLUMN = 0 * I_SCREEN_END_LINE = 0 * I_HTML_HEIGHT_TOP = 0 * I_HTML_HEIGHT_END = 0 * IT_ALV_GRAPHICS = * IT_HYPERLINK = * IT_ADD_FIELDCAT = * IT_EXCEPT_QINFO = * IR_SALV_FULLSCREEN_ADAPTER = * IMPORTING * E_EXIT_CAUSED_BY_CALLER = * ES_EXIT_CAUSED_BY_USER = TABLES t_outtab = t_results EXCEPTIONS program_error = 1 OTHERS = 2. IF sy-subrc <> 0. MESSAGE ID sy-msgid TYPE sy-msgty NUMBER sy-msgno WITH sy-msgv1 sy-msgv2 sy-msgv3 sy-msgv4. ENDIF. ENDFORM. " DISPLAY_RESULT
